movie.title: Chicken
movie.description_intro: Richard, 15 with learning difficulties, longs to put down roots but his restless and destructive brother, Polly, needs to keep moving. When the land they live on is bought by a new landowner, and the electricity supply to their caravan is cut, their already precarious living conditions get even worse. Then a chance meeting with the new landowner's daughter, 17 year old Annabel (Yasmin Paige), leaves Richard besotted; whilst Polly befriends the guys who run a seedy traveling fair. Richards optimistic view on life becomes increasingly difficult to maintain as Polly's abusive behavior worsens, and family secrets are revealed. His first true friend is Annabel. For better or worse, Richards life is about to change forever.

Richards optimistic view on life becomes increasingly difficult to maintain as Polly's abusive behavior worsens, and family secrets are revealed. His first true friend is Annabel. For better or worse, Richards life is about to change forever.

movies.title: Grace of My Heart
movies.summary: An aspiring singer, Denise Waverly/Edna Buxton, sacrifices her own singing career to write hit songs that launch the careers of other singers. The film follows her life from her first break, through the pain of rejection from the recording industry and a bad marriage, to her final triumph.

movies.title: In Our Nature
movies.summary: A scheduling mistake leads to an estranged father and son sharing a vacation home with their respective girlfriends.
movies.description_full: A scheduling mistake leads to an estranged father and son sharing a vacation home with their respective girlfriends.
movies.synopsis: A scheduling mistake leads to an estranged father and son sharing a vacation home with their respective girlfriends.

movies.title: A Crooked Somebody
movies.summary: An attention-seeking psychic is kidnapped and tries to use the situation to boost his popularity.
movies.description_full: An attention-seeking psychic is kidnapped and tries to use the situation to boost his popularity.
movies.synopsis: An attention-seeking psychic is kidnapped and tries to use the situation to boost his popularity.

movies.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
movies.summary: Steven Russell is happily married to Debbie, and a member of the local police force when a car accident provokes a dramatic reassessment of his life. Steven becomes open about his homosexuality and decides to live life to the fullest - even if it means breaking the law. Steven's new, extravagant lifestyle involves cons and fraud and, eventually, a stay in the State Penitentiary where he meets sensitive, soft-spoken Phillip Morris. His devotion to freeing Phillip from jail and building the perfect life together prompts Steven to attempt and often succeed at one impossible con after another.
